name: Warlock - Master of the Arcane
description: In a time of chaotic upheaval, the player takes the role of a great mage, a warlord vying for ultimate power.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows Vista, Windows 7 Processor:Dual Core CPU Memory:2 GB RAM Graphics:GeForce GT240 512Mb or comparable DirectX®:9.0c Hard Drive:4 GB HD space Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows 7 Processor:Quad Core CPU Memory:4 GB RAM Graphics:GeForce GTX460 1Gb or compartible DirectX®:9.0c Hard Drive:4 GB HD space Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
